settings.ship_content:
We provide free express international shipping & returns so you can shop with peace of mind. Need to size up or down - no problem.

We pay for the shoes to be sent back to Singapore using DHL Express. They will ship your replacement shoes for free as well! We seek your understanding that this service is limited to one return per order.

Our shoes need to be returned in its original condition with the box and tags intact.

settings.heading: Don't Miss Out
settings.sub_heading: By one more pair and get 30% off

settings.title: UNLINED LEATHER DESIGN
settings.heading: Velvety Soft Leather
settings.text: Supple to the touch, yet resistant to abrasions. The flexibility of our unlined leather shoes will conform remarkably to your feet for a luxurious fit. No need to ‘break-in’ your pair first. No need to worry about stuffy feet all day.

settings.title: ERGONOMIC SPORTS FOOTBED
settings.heading: Stride Technology
settings.text: Designed to support your entire body by providing stability and impact absorption for all-day wearing. Our ergonomic sports-engineered footbed is made from plant-based materials. Shoes that take care of you and the environment.

settings.title: LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN
settings.heading: Weighs 280 Grams
settings.text: Constructed to be lightweight and breathable. The combination of premium leathers with our ergonomic design makes our shoes ideal for warm weather. Just toss a pair into your duffle for whenever – it won’t weigh you down.

settings.title: 100% PREMIUM RUBBER SOLE
settings.heading: Flexible Sole
settings.text: Designed to keep you moving comfortably, the leather is stitched into flexible rubber soles which are water-resistant and durable. A sole with good grip gives you stability with every step, every time, at any age.

settings.title: VERSATILE EVERYDAY WEAR
settings.heading: A Perfect Match to Fit the Occasion
settings.text: Created to be your dress-up, dress-down, forgot-I-have-them-on shoes. We believe that aesthetics is definitely a function. Our diverse range of colors and styles will take you from playful casual to a touch of glam.

settings.heading: An Insanely Comfortable Shoe, That Looks Great.
settings.text_1: They pair well with almost everything
settings.text_3: ..well you know what happens when shoes don't breathe
settings.text_4: Weights less than half of a typical shoe or they're lighter than a can of coke
settings.quest_1: Will the same style fit differently in a different material?
settings.ans_1: Different types of leather or material may feel different at the initial wear. You can feel the stretch of a thinner leather (Goat) better than a thicker bovine leather or fabric. It's best to let the tighter shoe stretch to fit if you still have enough toe space. (Especially if you have been wearing that same size for Anothersole shoes.)
settings.quest_2: Should I wear sock with Anothersole ?
settings.ans_2:
Yes, we encourage you to wear dark hidden socks. There are many advantages in doing so:

   • Helps to absorb moisture from your feet
   • Avoid having color transfer onto your feet - Some color migration can be expected during initial wear or worn when the shoes are wet, especially for darker colored shoes. Yes, colour migration will reduce with wearing. (Be assured that consumer safe pigments are used for our leathers and are tested for VOC limits.)
settings.quest_3: Why can I see the contours of my toe?
settings.ans_3:
Anothersole is designed to be unlined hence only the soft leather touches your skin. In your initial wear, the outline of the big toe may be visible. Unlined leather stretches to a perfect fit and the bulge (or any protruding bones) will become less pronounced with wear.

We do not want to add any synthetic linings which makes the shoe stiff or stuffy. Enjoy this signature look of Anothersole - thousands of women have road tested them, loved and raved about this wearing experience.
settings.quest_4: Could there be differences between what I receive and what I see on your website/social media posts?
settings.ans_4: Leather is organic in nature and unique - no two leathers are identical. Slight imperfection, blemishes, uneven tonality, veins and grains are characteristics of natural leathers and are not defects. In addition, lightings used during photography and screen monitors’ resolution could be reasons of perceived color differences.

settings.title-help: Need help choosing the right size?
settings.text-help-right:
If the initial wear feels a bit snug, be assured that our leathers will stretch to fit with each wear like a pair of leather gloves. Buying a larger size may result the shoe slipping off at the back upon stretching.

If you are unsure and need some questions answered, please write to us at customerservice@anothersole.com or message us on FB Messenger.
settings.text-help-left:
Measure your feet and choose your size based on your measurements. If your foot length is 23.5 - you should be choosing size EU 38/US 7 as shown in the size guide.

Please note the width of our shoes in the size guide; it is measured based on the widest points of your feet.

Anothersole shoes have a standard width and does not cater to a wide fit. If the width of your feet exceeds the width of your footbed excessively, the leather may be stepped on and make contact with the ground leading to damage from abrasion.
settings.text-help-mob:
Measure your feet and choose your size based on your measurements. If your foot length is 23.5 - you should be choosing size EU 38/US 7 as shown in the size guide.

Please note the width of our shoes in the size guide; it is measured based on the widest points of your feet.

Anothersole shoes have a standard width and does not cater to a wide fit. If the width of your feet exceeds the width of your footbed excessively, the leather may be stepped on and make contact with the ground leading to damage from abrasion.

If the initial wear feels a bit snug, be assured that our leathers will stretch to fit with each wear like a pair of leather gloves. Buying a larger size may result the shoe slipping off at the back upon stretching.

If you are unsure and need some questions answered, please write to us at customerservice@anothersole.com or message us on FB Messenger.
settings.text-measure1:
Measure your feet and choose your size based on your measurements. If your foot length is 23.8 - you should be choosing size EU 37 as shown in the size guide.

Please note the width of our shoes in the size guide; it is measured based on the widest points of your feet.

settings.title: A Must-have Essential
settings.content: Every modern woman has a pair of go-to shoe she knows she can rely on. Experience blissful comfort. That pain you don’t feel after wearing shoes the whole day… yes, that’s what we are talking about. It’s all made possible as each pair is made with unlined leather and has an ergonomic sports-engineered footbed.
settings.mob-content: Every modern woman has a pair of go-to shoe she knows she can rely on.
